thread.title: Megan McKenna admits she's only "20% happy" with Pete Wicks as TOWIE returns
thread.title_full: Megan McKenna admits she's only "20% happy" with Pete Wicks as TOWIE returns

author: Vicki Newman
title: Megan McKenna admits she's only "20% happy" with Pete Wicks as TOWIE returns
text:
Megan McKenna admits she's only "20% happy" with Pete Wicks as TOWIE returns The couple were talking to their pals about each other on the show Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Megan says she's only been 20% happy with Pete Wicks Share this video Get celebs     
Megan McKenna says she's just 20% happy with Pete Wicks. 
The brunette beauty admitted that their relationship has been more unpleasant than pleasant lately. 
She made the confession when The Only Way Is Essex returned for its 20th series on Sunday night. 
The reality show, filmed in Tenerife this time around, saw Pete talking to the lads about Megan while she was talking to her pal - TOWIE newbie Amber - about him. 
Pete described his relationship with Megan as "a whole nutty circle of nutiness". Read More Pete chatted to the lads about Megan (Photo: ITV) 
He added: "I'm quite chilled out, nothing else pushes my buttons but she pushes my buttons. 
"After 10 months I should know how to deal with her but I don't." 
He also described her as a "very special individual". 
He added: "I try to show she can trust me by not going out but I've made myself frustrated by not being myself anymore and I need to go back to that person because that's who she fell in love with." 
Meanwhile, Megan was lying by the pool talking to Amber. They gave their perspective on the relationship (Photo: ITV) Pete and Megan kissed later in the show (Photo: ITV) 
She told her pal: "Obviously you know what's gone on. We end up having a massive row and spit up, I delete all our pictures from Twitter and Instagram." 
Megan says she acts like a "lunatic" by cutting pictures of them up and throwing his stuff away, before waking up the following day and realising how much she misses him. 
She said: "The next day I drive round his house asking him to get back together." Read More Megan talked to pal Amber (Photo: ITV) She said her relationship with Pete is 20% happy 80% rows (Photo: ITV) 
"Last month, we were like 80% rows, 20% happy," she added. 
"I want to get to the point we can sort it out and not brush things away. 
"I'm a hot head but he loses his s**t too, it's not just me and when we lose it together it's bad." 
Megan and Pete are back together following a massive break up when she found out he'd been texting other girls. 
Also in the show, Pete asked Megan to apologise for calling him "ugly" every time they have an argument. 
She told him to "shut up" because he knows she doesn't mean it. 
* TOWIE continues on ITVBe on Sundays at 10pm Like us on Facebook
